summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of NICU Approaches page with all 20 clinical approach guidelines. All approaches load correctly with updated 2022-2025 clinical guidelines. Dropdown selector, search functionality, patient info inputs, and drug calculations all work as expected. UI is consistent with clean 3-4 color scheme across all approaches.

issues: Console warning: Missing `Description` or `aria-describedby={undefined}` for {DialogContent} - accessibility improvement recommended

passed_tests: NICU Approaches page loads correctly at /nicu/approaches

All 20 NICU approaches present in dropdown selector (alphabetically sorted): Anemia, Apnea, BPD, CDH, CHD, Gastroschisis, HIE, Hypoglycemia, Jaundice, MAS, NEC, Omphalocele, PDA, Polycythemia, PPHN, RDS, Resuscitation, Seizures, Sepsis, TTN
Dropdown selector works - can switch between all 20 approaches
Search bar filters approaches correctly - searching 'seizures' returns 1 result
Patient info inputs (GA, Postnatal Age, Weight) are present and functional
All 20 approach components render without errors
Drug dosing calculations work correctly when weight is entered
Resuscitation approach: Epinephrine IV (0.25-0.75 mL for 2.5kg), ETT (1.25-2.5 mL), Volume expansion (25 mL)
Seizures approach: Phenobarbital loading (50 mg for 2.5kg), Levetiracetam (100-150 mg)
Sepsis approach: Ampicillin (75 mg for 1.5kg), Gentamicin calculations
NEC approach: Ampicillin, Gentamicin, Metronidazole dosing
ETT sizing table highlights correct row based on GA input
UI is consistent across all approaches with clean color scheme
Mobile responsiveness works correctly (tested at 390x844 viewport)
All approaches show updated clinical guidelines (2022-2025)
action_items: Minor: Add aria-describedby to DialogContent in Medical Disclaimer modal for accessibility
critical_code_review_comments: All 20 NICU approach components properly implemented with consistent UI design
data-testid attributes correctly implemented for all key elements
Dropdown selector uses alphabetically sorted approaches list
Search functionality with keyword matching works correctly
Weight-based drug calculations implemented in approach components
Patient info inputs (GA, Postnatal, Weight) passed as props to all approach components
Clean 3-4 color scheme consistently applied: slate/gray backgrounds, blue for key info, amber for definitions, red for warnings/risk factors, green for management
All approaches updated with latest clinical guidelines (2022-2025)
Reference footer shows WHO Neonatal Clinical Guidelines source
context_for_next_testing_agent: NICU Approaches page is fully functional with all 20 approaches. The 4 new approaches (CDH, CHD, Gastroschisis, Omphalocele) have been added and work correctly. All approaches have been updated with latest 2022-2025 clinical guidelines. UI has been refactored to use clean 3-4 color scheme (slate/gray, blue, amber, red, green). Drug calculations work correctly based on weight input. Search filters approaches by keywords. Navigation: Dashboard > NICU > Approaches widget works correctly.
